Define depreciation keys and calculation keys.

infoQuestion:
What do you define when configuring asset classes?
Note: There are 3 correct answers to this questions.
A general ledger account is defined with the account type "Nonoperating Expense or Income" Where can this account be used?
infoChoice: Profit and loss account that is used in margin analysis
Profit and loss account that is used in margin analysis and profit center accounting
Profit and loss account that is used in overhead management accounting
Profit and loss account that is used in profit center accounting

infoQuestion:
You want to configure the default baseline data for the payment terms of an incoming invoice. From which date can you derive the baseline date?
Note: There are 3 correct answers to this questions.

You need to post customer invoice though an interface with a non-SAP system. You want to define a new document type with a specific document number range that matches the document numbers of the source system. How do you define the document number range
infoChoice: You must use external number assignment
You must use internal number assignment
You can use internal or external number assignment, but only if it is continuous
You can use internal or external number assignment

infoQuestion:
How can you create an asset under construction?
Note: There are 2 correct answers to this questions.
infoChoice: Automatically, when setting capex cost from an internal order
Automatically, when creating an investment measure
Automatically, when setting capex cost from a WBS element
Manually (transaction AS01), using a specific asset class

infoQuestion: You perform foreign currency valuation for open items of you supplier accounts. The valuations will be used only for period end reposting and should them be reversed. What account does the system use to post the valuation differences?
infoChoice: Individual supplier accounts with special G/L indicator
Adjustment G/L account for foreign currency

infoQuestion: You are configuring asset-related posting of depreciation areas in Asset Accounting for a company code that uses the ledger approach to parallel valuation. Which of the following setting would lead to an error?
infoChoice: Area posts APC immediately, depreciation periodically

infoQuestion:
What area the maintenance levels of a screen layout rule for asset master data?
Note: There are 3 correct answers to this questions.

Which of the following closing activities is a 
so-called technical closing step?
infoChoice: Perform valuations of open items in foreign currency
Close the previous period in Material Management(MM)

infoQuestion:
You post a purchase order. For which expenses does the system calculate accruals?
Note: There are 2 correct answers to this questions.

Which prerequisites must be fulfilled to allow for negative posting of journal entries?
Note: There are 2 correct answers to this questions.
infoChoice: The posting key must allow negative postings
The company code must allow negative postings
The reversal reason must be configured to allow
The reversal accounts must be configured to allow

infoQuestion: What archiving step must precede archiving a supplier invoice posted directly to FI?

Which parameters can you specify directly when you create a new correspondence type?
Note: There are 3 correct answers to this questions.
Which date is used to determine the depreciation star date?

You 'd like to set up low values asset (LVA) 
management. What do you need to do?
infoChoice: Define two separate asset classes to manage LVA using individual or collective management
Specify the minimum amount for LVA at three levels: company code, depreciation area and asset class
Specify the minimum amount for LVA at two levels: company code and chart of depreciation
Define a base unit for measure for LVA in individual management

infoQuestion:
You want to post journal entries in a special 
period. Which conditions must be met?
Note: There are 2 correct answers to this questions.
infoChoice: You must enter a posting date in the last posting period
The balance carry-forward to the new fiscal year must have happened
The special period must be open for posting in the period control
The last posting period must be open for posting in the period control

infoQuestion:
What are the features of the Accrual Engine in SAP S/4HANA?
Note: There are 2 correct answers to this questions.
infoChoice: All accrual calculations must be reviewed and approved before posting.
Accrual postings with a maximum of two line items are supported.
All currencies of the general ledger are supported.
The fiscal year variant of the general ledger is supported.

infoQuestion: You are running an international business and you want to set up separate legal entities to run operations and perform accounting activities. Which organizational unit do you need to create for each legal entity?

How does SAP S4/HANA support the treatment of taxes?
Note: There are 3 correct answers to this questions.
infoChoice: It checks the tax amount entered and automatically
It post the tax amount to tax accounts
It checks the tax codes and automatically updates the taxes based on changes by tax authorities
It adjust the tax codes and automatically updates the procedure
It performs tax adjustments for cash discounts and other forms of deductions

infoQuestion: The country that your company code operates in has defined a new VAT tax rate percentage of 15%, which will become effective at the star of the next fiscal year. You create the new VAT codes 05 and 15 to cover this requirement. How can you ensure that users use the new tax codes when entering tax relevant documents starting next year?
infoChoice: Enter the new tax codes as default for users who have authorization to post general ledger transactions after balance carry forward is done
Enter the appropriate new VAT code in the tax category field of the relevant expense and revenue G/L accounts after balance carry forward is done
Create a substitution that changes the deprecated VAT code when relevant new one when entering documents with posting data in the new year
Create a validation that issues an error when the user uses a deprecated VAT code when entering documents with posting data in the new year

infoQuestion:
What area of the benefits of how data handled in SAP S/4HANA?
Note: There are 2 correct answers to this questions.
infoChoice: The data is aggregated in real time from any line item table.
The data is constantly auto-archived to optimize memory usage.
The data is available in real time at line item detail.
The data is summarized into higher levels of aggregates to accelerate system performance.

infoQuestion: How does the system perform the normal reversal of a journal entry?
infoChoice: It creates an inverse posting by resenting the transaction figures for cleared documents.
It creates an inverse posting by increasing the transaction figures.
It creates an inverse posting by decreasing the transaction figures.
It creates an inverse posting by resenting the transaction figures.
